Ingredients: 1¼ cups extra-virgin olive oil, divided,1 garlic clove, smashed,1 oz. mixed hardy herb leaves (such as rosemary, sage, thyme, and/or marjoram; about 1 heaping cup),1 tsp. fennel pollen (optional),7 oz. tender spring greens (such as arugula, dandelion, and/or broccoli rabe leaves; about 5 cups),5 oz. mixed tender herb leaves (suchas mint, basil, lovage, celery leaves, and/or parsley; about 6 cups),½ tsp. kosher salt, plus more,1 lb. fusilli (spiral-shaped pasta)
